  "description": "At TeamAce, we help businesses across different industries thrive. We work with businesses to create their desired change by getting the right people, designing bespoke business processes, leveraging data, applying insights and technology. We combine our expertise and take different bespoke approaches to solve different business challenges because we believe there is no one size fits all approach. This way, you keep your eyes on the price and thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content and Engagement Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)

Job Summary


	Team-Ace is seeking a highly creative and data-driven Content and Engagement Specialist with expertise in graphic design and social media strategy.
	This role is crucial for developing and executing our content strategy, ensuring visual consistency, and driving meaningful audience engagement across all digital platforms.
	The Specialist will own the content lifecycle from conceptualization and design to scheduling, deployment, and performance analysis, directly contributing to our brand growth and community development goals.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead the conceptualization and design of high-impact graphics for social media, blog posts, and marketing campaigns, maintaining brand consistency across all visual assets using tools like Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, etc.
	Develop, manage, and execute the comprehensive social media content calendar across platforms (Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook), ensuring timely and strategic publishing.
	Proactively monitor and manage audience engagement, fostering community growth by responding to comments, messages, and initiating dialogues.
	Collaborate cross-functionally with the marketing and product teams to translate brand objectives into compelling content strategies and campaigns.
	Analyze and report on the performance of all digital content using relevant metrics, providing actionable insights to optimize future strategies.
	Stay abreast of digital trends, emerging platforms, and social media best practices, recommending and implementing innovative content approaches.


Requirements


	HND/BSc in Marketing, Communications, Graphic Design, or any related field.
	A minimum of 2 years of professional experience in content creation, social media management, or a similar role.
	Proven, expert-level design skills with a strong portfolio demonstrating visual storytelling, layout design, and branding capabilities.
	Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Canva, Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, or InDesign is mandatory.
	In-depth familiarity with all major social media platforms and their respective content strategies.
	Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with a proven ability to craft engaging copy.
	Demonstrated ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and take full ownership of content performance.


What we Offer


	Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.
	Opportunities for professional growth and development.
	A collaborative and inclusive work environment
	Health insurance and pension, etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content and Engagement Specialist

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid)

Job Summary

	The Specialist will own the content lifecycle from conceptualization and design to scheduling, deployment, and performance analysis, directly contributing to our brand growth and community development goals.

	Lead the conceptualization and design of high-impact graphics for social media, blog posts, and marketing campaigns, maintaining brand consistency across all visual assets using tools like Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, etc.
	Develop, manage, and execute the comprehensive social media content calendar across platforms (Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook), ensuring timely and strategic publishing.
	Proactively monitor and manage audience engagement, fostering community growth by responding to comments, messages, and initiating dialogues.
	Collaborate cross-functionally with the marketing and product teams to translate brand objectives into compelling content strategies and campaigns.

	Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with a proven ability to craft engaging copy.
	Demonstrated ability to work independently, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and take full ownership of content performance.

	Salary: N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Administration Officer",
  "description": "Sayed Farms Limited is specialized in poultry sector covering all its major aspects, and also in the distribution of frozen food in the Nigerian Market. Our line of frozen products has expanded to include the finest quality of chicken, potatoes, cheese, vegetables, seafood, and ice cream products in the market.

We are currently hiring an experienced and objective-driven candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Administration Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Summary


	The Senior Administration Officer is responsible for independently handling and coordinating all core administrative, immigration, accommodation, housing, utilities, vehicle documentation, travel logistics, and vendor-related activities across the company.
	The role ensures smooth daily operations, timely follow-up on critical administrative tasks, and full compliance with immigration and housing requirements.


Role Responsibilities
Immigration, Work Permits &amp; Visas:


	Manage the full process of STR, TWP, CERPAC, Minor Visas, extensions, and renewals.
	Maintain accurate immigration documentation and track all expiry dates.
	Coordinate with immigration agents, embassies, and government offices.
	Follow up proactively to avoid delays or violations.
	Manage the full process of quota (new, renewal)


Accommodation &amp; Housing Coordination:


	Arrange and prepare accommodation for new joiners, expatriates, and visitors.
	Ensure all units are properly set up (utilities, cleanliness, readiness) before arrival.
	Maintain updated tracking of occupied, vacant, and reserved units.
	Coordinate move-in/move-out, key handovers, and inventories.
	Follow up with the Maintenance Department on all ongoing work and report any new maintenance requirements promptly.
	Responsible for all electronics in the guest houses, including coordinating with the relevant service companies and outsourced technicians.


Housing Rentals, Leases &amp; Hotels:


	Follow up on lease renewals, rent payments, service charges, and WHT processing.
	Maintain an updated housing portfolio and all related lease documentation.
	Communicate with landlords for repairs and housing matters.
	Secure and manage corporate hotel rates and bookings across branches.


Company Vehicles &amp; Registry:


	Maintain accurate records for all company vehicles including allocation, insurance, repairs, and documentation.
	Follow up on servicing, repairs, and transfer of ownership.
	Track drivers&rsquo; assignments, fuel usage, mileage logs, and renewals.
	Prepare monthly vehicle and fleet status reports.


Utilities &amp; Administrative Support Services:


	Monitor electricity, water, gas, internet, fuel, generator diesel, and ensure timely payments.
	Prevent service disruption by proactive follow-up.
	Maintain updated inventory of houses, appliances, and vehicles.
	Coordinate required repairs or replacements with vendors.


Travel Logistics &amp; Airport Protocol:


	Arrange flight tickets, hotel bookings, and transportation for employees, management, and visitors.
	Coordinate airport pick-ups and drop-offs.
	Support business travel across branches (Ibadan, Lagos, Abuja, PH).
	Organize full onboarding logistics for incoming new employees.


Administration &amp; Vendor Documentation:


	Maintain organized and up-to-date documentation for visas, leases, cars, vendors, and hotels.
	Update trackers, shared folders, and administrative files regularly.
	Coordinate with vendors for documents, invoices, quotes, and confirmations.
	Ensure compliance with documentation standards for audits and reviews.


Monthly Administration &amp; Mobility Reporting:


	Prepare a consolidated monthly report covering:
	
		Visa &amp; Permit status
		Housing and accommodation updates
		Hotel usage
		Vehicle/fleet activity
		Utilities payments and variance
	
	
	Highlight risks, expiries, and recommended actions.
	Submit the monthly report to the HR Manager accurately and on time.


Key Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Business Administration, Public Administration, Management, or related field.
	Minimum of 8 years of administrative experience in manufacturing or industrial operations.
	Strong knowledge of expatriate documentation processes and government regulatory requirements.
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Good vendor management and supervision capabilities.
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
	Strong ownership and accountability
	High attention to detail
	Excellent follow-up and coordination
	Confidentiality and integrity
	Proactive problem-solving.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their Application Letters and CV along with passport photographs to:&nbsp;jobs@sayedfarms.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
